subsection.name: Ant
subsection.p: Build tool used to build this framework. Version 1.6.5 and up should work.

subsection.name: JBoss, (Not MailSigner builds)
subsection.p: The recommended application server used by SignServer. Version 4.2.2 and up have been most tested.

subsection.name: Java Development Kit
subsection.p: The Java Development Kit is required to compile and execute. Version 1.5 and above is required.

subsection.name: Database, MySQL Cluster is recommended.
subsection.p: MySQL NDB Cluster is needed for full High-Availability of a SignServer cluster. MySQL 5.0.27 is the most tested version.
